pages.text: Embodies are hostile creatures that can be found in Soul Sand zones of The Nether.$(br2)They will attack Skeletons, Piglins and you too, of course.$(br2)On death, they may drop Soul Salt Clumps, this item can be used to make new blocks Charged Chiseled Soul Slate Brick and Charged Chiseled Soul Stone Brick.
It can be used to craft Cured Jerky, this item will give you Speed II effect for 7 seconds.
